name: Inception
summary: A skilled thief, who enters people's dreams to steal their secrets, is given a chance to have his past crimes erased if he can plant an idea into someone's mind.

name: Titanic
summary: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

name: The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, this film follows his rise and fall in the world of stock market fraud and excess.

name: The Revenant
summary: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by his companions.

name: Shutter Island
summary: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a prisoner from a psychiatric facility, uncovering dark secrets along the way.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
summary: A swashbuckling adventure where Captain Jack Sparrow teams up with a blacksmith to rescue the governor's kidnapped daughter from cursed pirates.

name: Edward Scissorhands
summary: A gentle artificial man with scissors for hands is taken in by a kind woman and struggles to find his place in a suburban town.

name: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
summary: A vengeful barber returns to London seeking retribution, using his razor to exact his deadly plan while partnering with a pie shop owner.

name: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
summary: A reclusive chocolate factory owner opens his doors to five lucky children, leading to a whimsical and eye-opening adventure.

name: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
summary: Dark wizard Grindelwald gathers followers for his cause while a young wizard and his allies try to stop his rise to power.

name: Fight Club
summary: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

name: Se7en
summary: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

name: Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France, a group of Jewish soldiers plan an attack on the top Nazi leaders while a woman seeks revenge for her family's murder.

name: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
summary: A man is born in his eighties and ages backward, leading to a unique life journey filled with love and loss.

name: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
summary: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood’s Golden Age.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
summary: After more than 30 years of service, Maverick is still pushing the limits as a top Navy aviator, facing the ghosts of his past while training a new generation of pilots.

name: Mission: Impossible – Fallout
summary: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team race against time to prevent a global catastrophe after a mission goes wrong.

name: Edge of Tomorrow
summary: A soldier caught in a time loop must use his repeated deaths to learn how to defeat an alien invasion.

name: Jerry Maguire
summary: A successful sports agent has a crisis of conscience and starts his own agency, discovering the true meaning of loyalty and love.

name: The Last Samurai
summary: An American soldier in Japan finds himself drawn into the way of the samurai and struggles with his allegiance as war looms.

name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
summary: A reprogrammed Terminator is sent back in time to protect a young boy, the key to humanity’s survival, from a more advanced and deadly machine.

name: Predator
summary: An elite military team is hunted by an alien warrior in the jungle, forcing them into a deadly battle for survival.

name: Total Recall
summary: A man discovers his memories may not be real and embarks on a journey to Mars to uncover the truth about his identity.

name: Commando
summary: A retired elite Black Ops Commando must rescue his kidnapped daughter from mercenaries before time runs out.

name: True Lies
summary: A secret agent struggles to balance his work and personal life while uncovering a terrorist plot.

name: The Dark Knight
summary: Batman faces his greatest challenge as the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham, pushing him to the edge in a battle of chaos versus justice.

name: American Psycho
summary: A wealthy New York investment banker hides his psychopathic ego beneath a polished exterior, leading to a descent into madness.

name: Ford v Ferrari
summary: A determined car designer and a fearless driver team up to challenge Ferrari at the 1966 Le Mans race.

name: The Prestige
summary: Two rival magicians engage in a battle of wits, obsession, and deception as they seek the ultimate illusion.

name: The Machinist
summary: A factory worker suffering from extreme insomnia and paranoia unravels a disturbing mystery about his life.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
summary: Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

name: Se7en
summary: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

name: Bruce Almighty
summary: A frustrated reporter is given divine powers by God to see if he can do a better job at running the world.

name: The Dark Knight
summary: Batman faces his greatest psychological and physical challenge yet when he squares off against the Joker in Gotham City.

name: Now You See Me
summary: An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances and reward their audiences with the money.

name: John Wick
summary: A retired hitman seeks vengeance against those who killed his beloved dog, a final gift from his late wife.

name: The Matrix
summary: A computer hacker discovers the shocking truth about his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

name: Speed
summary: A young cop must prevent a bomb from exploding on a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

name: Constantine
summary: A cynical occult detective battles demons and uncovers a plot that could bring Hell to Earth.

name: The Devil's Advocate
summary: A rising lawyer joins a prestigious firm, only to discover his boss may be the Devil himself.

name: Forrest Gump
summary: A kind-hearted man with a low IQ inadvertently influences historical events while pursuing his lifelong love.

name: Saving Private Ryan
summary: A group of U.S. soldiers is sent on a dangerous mission to rescue a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

name: Cast Away
summary: A FedEx executive must learn to survive alone on a deserted island after his plane crashes in the Pacific.

name: The Green Mile
summary: A prison guard discovers that a death row inmate possesses a mysterious healing power, challenging his beliefs about justice.

name: Captain Phillips
summary: The true story of a cargo ship captain who is taken hostage by Somali pirates and must navigate a tense standoff.

name: The Pursuit of Happyness
summary: A struggling salesman fights against all odds to provide a better life for his son, embarking on a journey of resilience and hope.

name: I Am Legend
summary: A lone scientist in a post-apocalyptic world battles against mutated creatures while searching for a cure to save humanity.

name: Men in Black
summary: A secret government agency monitors extraterrestrial activity on Earth, with two agents working to keep the world safe from alien threats.

name: Independence Day
summary: As aliens launch a massive invasion on Earth, a group of brave individuals, including a fighter pilot, rise to defend humanity.

name: King Richard
summary: A determined father trains his daughters, Venus and Serena Williams, shaping them into two of the greatest tennis players in history.

name: Good Will Hunting
summary: A janitor at MIT has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

name: The Martian
summary: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars and must rely on his ingenuity to survive while NASA works to bring him home.

name: The Bourne Identity
summary: A man suffering from amnesia must discover his identity while evading assassins and uncovering a covert conspiracy.

name: Interstellar
summary: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space to find a new habitable planet for humanity’s survival.

name: Saving Private Ryan
summary: During World War II, a group of U.S. soldiers embarks on a mission to find and bring home a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in combat.
